segment.source: How to use IEAK 11 while planning, customizing, and building the custom installation package.
segment.target: How to use IEAK 11 while planning, customizing, and building the custom installation package.

segment.source: Using Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) to create packages (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Using Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) to create packages (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Using Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) to create packages
segment.target: Using Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) to create packages

segment.source: Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) helps you set up, deploy, and maintain Internet Explorer 11.
segment.target: Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) helps you set up, deploy, and maintain Internet Explorer 11.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: IEAK 11 works in network environments, with or without Microsoft Active Directory.
segment.target: IEAK 11 works in network environments, with or without Microsoft Active Directory.

segment.source: Plan, Customize, and Build with the IEAK 11
segment.target: Plan, Customize, and Build with the IEAK 11

segment.source: Consider these activities while planning, customizing, and building the custom installation package.
segment.target: Consider these activities while planning, customizing, and building the custom installation package.

segment.source: Plan
segment.target: Plan

segment.source: Before you begin, you should:
segment.target: Before you begin, you should:

segment.source: Check the operating system requirements.
segment.target: Check the operating system requirements.

segment.source: Check that the requirements for the computer you're building your installation package from, and the computers you're installing IE11 to, all meet the system requirements for IEAK 11 and IE11.
segment.target: Check that the requirements for the computer you're building your installation package from, and the computers you're installing IE11 to, all meet the system requirements for IEAK 11 and IE11.

segment.source: For Internet Explorer requirements, see System requirements and language support for Internet Explorer 11 (IE11).
segment.target: For Internet Explorer requirements, see System requirements and language support for Internet Explorer 11 (IE11).

segment.source: For IEAK 11 requirements, see Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) - Administration Guide for IT Pros.
segment.target: For IEAK 11 requirements, see Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) - Administration Guide for IT Pros.

segment.source: Decide on your distribution method.
segment.target: Decide on your distribution method.

segment.source: Decide how to distribute your custom installation package: Windows Update, System Center System Center 2012 R2 Configuration Manager, or your network.
segment.target: Decide how to distribute your custom installation package: Windows Update, System Center System Center 2012 R2 Configuration Manager, or your network.

segment.source: Gather URLs and branding and custom graphics.
segment.target: Gather URLs and branding and custom graphics.

segment.source: Collect the URLs for your company's own Home, Search, and Support pages, plus any custom branding and graphic files for the browser toolbar button and the Favorites list icons.
segment.target: Collect the URLs for your company's own Home, Search, and Support pages, plus any custom branding and graphic files for the browser toolbar button and the Favorites list icons.

segment.source: Identify trusted network servers.
segment.target: Identify trusted network servers.

segment.source: Decide which servers your employees should use to install the custom IE package.
segment.target: Decide which servers your employees should use to install the custom IE package.

segment.source: These servers need to be listed as trusted sites.
segment.target: These servers need to be listed as trusted sites.

segment.source: Set up automatic detection and configuration settings.
segment.target: Set up automatic detection and configuration settings.

segment.source: Decide whether to automatically customize IE11 the first time it's started.
segment.target: Decide whether to automatically customize IE11 the first time it's started.

segment.source: Identify custom components for uninstallation.
segment.target: Identify custom components for uninstallation.

segment.source: Decide whether to include any custom uninstallation programs.
segment.target: Decide whether to include any custom uninstallation programs.

segment.source: Uninstallation programs let your employees remove your custom components through Uninstall or change a program in the Control Panel.
segment.target: Uninstallation programs let your employees remove your custom components through Uninstall or change a program in the Control Panel.

segment.source: Identify ActiveX controls.
segment.target: Identify ActiveX controls.

segment.source: Decide if you'll use ActiveX controls in your company.
segment.target: Decide if you'll use ActiveX controls in your company.

segment.source: If you already use ActiveX, you should get an inventory of your active controls.
segment.target: If you already use ActiveX, you should get an inventory of your active controls.

segment.source: Customize and build
segment.target: Customize and build

segment.source: After installing IE11 and the IEAK 11, you should:
segment.target: After installing IE11 and the IEAK 11, you should:

segment.source: Prepare your build computer.
segment.target: Prepare your build computer.

segment.source: Create your build environment on the computer you're using to build the custom package.
segment.target: Create your build environment on the computer you're using to build the custom package.

segment.source: Create your branding and custom graphics.
segment.target: Create your branding and custom graphics.

segment.source: If you don't have any, create custom branding and graphic files for the browser toolbar button and icons in your Favorites list.
segment.target: If you don't have any, create custom branding and graphic files for the browser toolbar button and icons in your Favorites list.

segment.source: Specify your servers as trusted sites.
segment.target: Specify your servers as trusted sites.

segment.source: Identify your installation servers as trusted sites, in the Trusted sites zone of the Internet Options box.
segment.target: Identify your installation servers as trusted sites, in the Trusted sites zone of the Internet Options box.

segment.source: Turn on automatic detection and configuration settings (Optional).
segment.target: Turn on automatic detection and configuration settings (Optional).

segment.source: Set up your network so that IE is automatically customized the first time it's started.
segment.target: Set up your network so that IE is automatically customized the first time it's started.

segment.source: Set up custom components for uninstallation.
segment.target: Set up custom components for uninstallation.

segment.source: Create the custom .inf file you'll use to register your custom uninstallation programs.
segment.target: Create the custom .inf file you'll use to register your custom uninstallation programs.

segment.source: Set up ActiveX controls.
segment.target: Set up ActiveX controls.

segment.source: Add any new ActiveX controls to the Axaa.adm file, using a text editor.
segment.target: Add any new ActiveX controls to the Axaa.adm file, using a text editor.

segment.source: Create a custom browser package.
segment.target: Create a custom browser package.

segment.source: Create your custom installation package, using IE Customization Wizard 11.
segment.target: Create your custom installation package, using IE Customization Wizard 11.

segment.source: For more information about using the wizard, see Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) Customization Wizard options.
segment.target: For more information about using the wizard, see Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) Customization Wizard options.
